title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Cereal Seed)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Cereal Seed) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2020.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Union (Cereal Seed) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 217 of
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Cereal Seed) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 217 of 
2013) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the definition of 
“Directive” (as amended by the European Union (Cereal Seed) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 454 of 2018)) the following: 

“‘Directive’ means Council Directive 66/402/EEC of 14 June 19662 
(as amended by Council Directive 69/60/EEC of 18 February 19693, 
Council Directive 71/162/EEC of 30 March 19714, Council Directive 
72/274/EEC of 20 July 19725, Council Directive 72/418/EEC of 6 
December 19726, Council Directive 73/438/EEC of 11 December 
19737, Council Directive 75/444/EEC of 26 June 19758, Council 
Directive 78/55/EEC of 19 December 19779, Council Directive 
78/692/EEC of 25 July 197810, Commission Directive 79/641/EEC of 
27 June 197911, Council Directive 79/692/EEC of 24 July 197912, 
Council Directive 86/155/EEC of 22 April 198613, Commission 
Directive 86/320/EEC of 20 June 198614, Commission Directive 
87/120/EEC of 14 January 198715, Council Directive 88/380/EEC of 
13 June 198816, Council Directive 90/654/EEC of 4 December 199017,

(EU) 2016/320 of 3 March 2016);”.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2020/177 by amending the Annexes I and II to Directive 
66/402/EEC as they relate to inspections for Union regulated non-quarantine 
pests (RNQPs) and measures intended to prevent their presence on cereal seeds 
for planting.
